Text.Page:
Here to kill stuff? Good. Let's...hmm?

Oh, nevermind. Let's see what these orders say.

You're on Desert Scourge {@LinkCreature:35#5#crushers}, {@LinkCreature:35#6#manglers}, {@LinkCreature:35#2#choppers}, {@LinkCreature:35#1#scouts}, and {@LinkCreature:35#4#reapers}, and {@LinkCreature:35#14#vulcan raiders} this round.

Go see Donabel when you're through.

Great job.

We were able to retake the mine thanks to your help.

Here, please take this reward.
You'll get a reward when you finish up the order.
